This rapidly relieves acid pain, disperses gastric foam and facilitates eructation of gas and air.

name: Joya Wings  Flow

description: Whisper Nights, with 15 pads per pack, is designed by Sun Pharmaceutical Ltd. for optimal overnight protection. The specially crafted pads provide a comfortable and secure feel, ensuring you wake up feeling fresh and confident. Whisper Nights is your ideal companion for a worry-free night.

description: Senora Ultra Flow, with 8 ultrathin pads, is meticulously crafted by Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd. for regular flow days. The ultrathin design provides discreet protection and comfort, allowing you to stay active and confident throughout the day. Trust Senora for a superior feminine care experience.

description: Experience superior protection with Freedom Wings by ACI Limited. This pack of 8 heavy-flow pads ensures maximum comfort and security. The wings provide extra coverage and prevent back leakage, allowing you to confidently carry on with your day. Choose Freedom for reliable feminine hygiene.

description: Whisper Ultra Comfort XL offers superior protection with 10 pads for heavy flow days. Specially designed by SMC Enterprise Limited, it provides exceptional comfort and prevents back leakage, ensuring you stay confidently fresh and dry throughout the day.

description: Experience ultimate comfort with Joya Sanitary Napkin by ACI Limited. This pack of 6 pads provides reliable protection and freshness. The advanced design ensures quick absorption, even fluid distribution, and extra layers to prevent any back leakage for worry-free days.

name: Freedom Belt System
description: Introducing Freedom Belt System by Sun Pharmaceutical Ltd. This revolutionary product brings comfort and security to your feminine hygiene routine. The adjustable belt and reliable pad attachment ensure a worry-free experience. Stay confident and active with this innovative solution.

name: Joya All Night Wings

name: Neocare

name: Freedom Belt System
description: Introducing Freedom Belt System by Unimax Industries Ltd. This innovative product brings comfort and security to your baby's hygiene routine. The adjustable belt and reliable attachment ensure a worry-free experience. Provide your baby with the best care using Freedom Belt System.

name: Savlon Baby Wipes
description: Savlon Baby Wipes by ACI Limited are a gentle and effective solution for your baby's hygiene. With 100 wipes per pack, these wipes are enriched with aloe vera and chamomile, ensuring a soft and soothing experience. Keep your baby clean and happy with Savlon Baby Wipes.

name: Thai Wet Wipes
description: Experience the quality of Thai Wet Wipes by Unimax Industries Ltd. This pack of 120 wipes is designed for convenient and quick cleansing. The gentle formula ensures your baby's skin stays fresh and soft. Trust Thai Wet Wipes for efficient and reliable baby care.

description: Nestle Bangladesh Limited presents Baby Wet Towel, weighing 80 gm. These moist towels are perfect for quick and gentle cleaning. The hypoallergenic formula ensures your baby's skin remains soft and moisturized. Embrace convenience with the reliable care of Baby Wet Towel.

description: ACI Limited introduces Avonee Mini Pant, a pack of 10 baby pants designed for comfort and ease. These mini pants provide secure and leak-proof coverage, allowing your baby to move freely. Ensure a happy and active day for your little one with Avonee Mini Pant.

description: Nestle Bangladesh Limited presents Lactogen 1, a premium baby formula weighing 400 gm. Specially crafted to meet the nutritional needs of infants, Lactogen 1 provides essential nutrients for healthy growth and development. Choose Lactogen 1 for your baby's optimal nourishment.

These wipes are specially formulated with a mild and soothing formula, ensuring your baby's skin stays soft and clean. With Supermom, provide your baby with the care they deserve.

name: Orostar Plus
description: Orostar Plus by ACI Limited is a premium dental care solution in a 250ml pack. Specially formulated for complete oral hygiene, it ensures fresh breath and cavity protection. The advanced formula helps maintain healthy gums and teeth, providing you with a confident smile and optimal oral health.

name: Listacare Blue Mint
description: Experience the refreshing Listacare Blue Mint by GSK in a convenient 120ml size. This toothpaste combines effective cavity protection with a burst of blue mint freshness. The advanced formula ensures a thorough clean, leaving your mouth feeling revitalized and your breath fresh throughout the day.

name: Mediplus
description: Mediplus by Anfords, in a 140gm pack, is your go-to dental care choice. This toothpaste offers a comprehensive solution for healthy teeth and gums. The unique formula tackles plaque, provides cavity protection, and leaves your mouth feeling clean and refreshed. Elevate your oral care routine with Mediplus.

name: Listacare Gold
description: Listacare Gold, brought to you by Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd., is a premium dental care choice in a generous 220ml size. This toothpaste offers superior cavity protection, fights germs, and provides lasting freshness. Make Listacare Gold an essential part of your daily oral care routine.

name: Mediplus DS
description: Mediplus DS by Anfords is a dental care innovation in a 140ml pack. The Dual Strength formula ensures effective plaque removal, cavity protection, and lasting freshness. With Mediplus DS, enjoy a confident smile and optimal oral health every day.

name: Orostar Plus
description: Orostar Plus by ACI Limited is a dental care solution in a convenient 120ml pack. Specially formulated for complete oral hygiene, it ensures fresh breath and cavity protection. The advanced formula helps maintain healthy gums and teeth, providing you with a confident smile and optimal oral health.

name: Mediplus Toothbrush
description: Enhance your oral care routine with the Mediplus Toothbrush by Anfords. This premium toothbrush, weighing 75 gm, features advanced bristle technology for effective plaque removal and gentle gum care. Experience superior cleaning and comfort with the Mediplus Toothbrush.

name: Sensodyne Fresh Gel
description: Sensodyne Fresh Gel by GSK, in a 70 gm pack, is the ideal choice for sensitive teeth. The unique formula provides effective relief from sensitivity while offering a burst of fresh gel flavor. Say goodbye to tooth sensitivity with the soothing experience of Sensodyne Fresh Gel.

name: Sensodyne Repair
description: Sensodyne Repair by GSK, in a 180gm pack, is the ultimate solution for sensitive teeth. This toothpaste provides advanced repair and relief for sensitive teeth. The clinically proven formula works to repair sensitive areas of your teeth, offering long-lasting protection and a soothing experience.

name: Mediplus Fluoride Gel
description: Mediplus Fluoride Gel by Anfords, in a 100ml pack, is a specialized dental gel for superior cavity protection. Enriched with fluoride, this gel strengthens tooth enamel and provides effective protection against cavities. Incorporate Mediplus Fluoride Gel into your daily oral care routine for optimal dental health.

name: Hexisol
description: Hexisol by ACI Limited is a reliable hand sanitizer in a 250ml pack. It ensures effective germ protection and hygiene on the go. The quick-drying formula leaves your hands feeling clean and refreshed. Make Hexisol your trusted companion for maintaining cleanliness and health in your daily life.

name: Savlon CreamSelect-Plus
description: Savlon CreamSelect-Plus by Neoplast Co Ltd. comes in a 120ml tube, providing effective relief for minor cuts, burns, and skin irritations. The advanced formula promotes faster healing and soothes the skin. Keep Savlon CreamSelect-Plus handy for immediate first aid and skin care.

name: Savlon Antiseptic
description: Savlon Antiseptic by Mundipharma (BD) Pvt. Ltd. is a trusted antiseptic solution in a 140gm bottle. It provides effective protection against germs and helps prevent infection in cuts, scratches, and wounds. Make Savlon Antiseptic a staple in your first aid kit for overall family protection.

name: One Time Bandage
description: One Time Bandage by Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd. is a versatile and durable solution for wound care. This 220ml spray-on bandage provides a protective barrier for cuts and abrasions. Its quick-drying formula ensures convenience and comfort. Keep One Time Bandage for hassle-free wound protection.

name: Isabgul Plus
description: Isabgul Plus by ACI Limited, in a 140ml pack, is a natural laxative for effective digestive support. It contains isabgul husk, known for its gentle and natural relief from constipation. name: Alcohol Pad
description: Alcohol Pad by Neoplast Co Ltd. is an essential component of your first aid kit. This 120ml pack of alcohol pads provides effective antiseptic action for cleaning wounds and surfaces. name: Nizoder
description: Nizoder by Mundipharma (BD) Pvt. Ltd. is a medicated powder in a 75 gm pack, providing effective relief from prickly heat and skin irritation. The soothing formula absorbs excess moisture, keeping your skin cool and comfortable. Stay refreshed with Nizoder, your go-to solution for skin care.

name: Cotton Wool
description: Cotton Wool by Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd. comes in a 70 gm pack, offering soft and absorbent cotton for various personal care needs. It is ideal for cleaning wounds, applying skincare products, and more. Choose Cotton Wool for gentle and hygienic personal care applications.

name: SensiShield Hand Sanitizer
description: SensiShield Hand Sanitizer by ACI Limited offers effective and convenient hand hygiene in a 200ml pack. The fast-acting formula kills germs and leaves your hands feeling refreshed. name: Neoplus Pain Relief Balm
description: Neoplus Pain Relief Balm, in a 50gm pack, is a soothing solution for relieving muscular and joint pain. The unique blend of ingredients provides a warming effect, promoting relaxation and comfort. Trust Neoplus for effective pain relief and enhanced well-being.
